feed.title: Lissen Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Lissen: 1.3.8
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Feature/OAuth-login by @GrakovNe in https://github.com/GrakovNe/lissen-android/pull/142

Two important things:

  • Here you can see how OAuth login works with the demo server: https://www.youtube.com/shorts/XTna1ra5b-U
  • To enable OAuth login, you must configure it on the ABS server and add the lissen://oauth scheme to the redirect URI whitelist.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GrakovNe/lissen-android/compare/1.3.7...1.3.8
